title: Presidential threat
casefile_description: Disturbing call from the Whitehouse: The president is under a great threat, they say. Kidnapped?! Godspeed, agent.
win_result: Turns out Mr. President had mixed up which button calls for international aid and which calls for Diet-Coke. You and your $BEST_ITEM appered sharp, however, and Mr. President was impressed
loss_result: Turns out Mr. President had mixed up which button calls for international aid and which calls for Diet-Coke. You and your $WORST_ITEM boarded the next flight home with a soda in hand.
